description: Deployed fixes to numerous bugs. Implemented and integrated newly developed features to our existing codebase primarily focused on improving error-handling and user experience.
Developed, optimized, and deployed a 3D project for Jollibee Foods Corporation. Maintained and added new features to the company's website.
Developed and deployed an e-commerce website that re-sells shoes.
Developed and deployed a game portal. Developed a ticket booking website for AYO Philippines. Maintained and added new features to the company website. Worked on several other projects.
